c2d 0.0.9040

Assert referendum variables are present

Source: R/c2d.gen.R
assert_vars.Rd

Asserts the specified vars are present in the supplied referendum data. Depending on vars, additional integrity checks are performed.

assert_vars(data, vars)

Arguments

data

C2D referendum data as returned by rfrnds().

vars

Names of the variables to check. A character vector.

Value

data, invisibly.

See also

Other referendum data functions: add_rfrnds(), count_rfrnds(), delete_rfrnds(), download_file_attachment(), edit_rfrnds(), rfrnd_exists(), rfrnds(), rfrnd(), search_rfrnds(), validate_rfrnds()

Examples

c2d::rfrnd(id = "5bbbe26a92a21351232dd73f") |> c2d::assert_vars(vars = "country_code")

try(
  tibble::tibble(country_code = "AN") |> c2d::assert_vars(vars = "country_code")
)
#> Error in assert_content(data[[.x]]) : 
#>   Assertion on `data$country_code` failed: The following country codes
#> have been deleted from ISO 3166-1 and were moved to ISO 3166-3 (former
#> countries) instead: "AN"
